name: Honey, I'm House!
description:
You are a house. Please help your human out of bed and direct him to complete his morning routine. Destinations are represented by green cubes. Humans like to take showers, wear clothing, consume coffee, and go to work, in that order. Please be a good house and take good care of your human today.

INSTRUCTIONS: Play this game using the mouse. Left-click anywhere on the house, hold, and drag in any direction to begin spinning the house. Repeat as desired. To slow rotation, click and drag in reverse. Click and hold the right mouse button to SNAP the house back to its original orientation. Warning: this may launch the ragdoll man at ludicrous speed. But it's okay, he can take it
